Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2013 09:25PM - edited Jan 3, 2013 09:27PM by Myklee2001 I just got my drains removed , thank God , that was the worst part of a bilateral mascetomy with lat flap. Private message me if you would like me to mail them to you God bless you all Marilee
